labs.description: Required properties to create a DevTest Lab

virtualMachines.description: Required properties to create a virtual machine in an existing DevTest Lab

___labVirtualNetworkId.description: The id for the virtual network

___sshKey.description: SSH key used for connection to Linux machines

___customImageId.description: The id of the custom image.

___password.description: Password of account used for connection to VM

___isAuthenticationWithSshKey.description: Sets whether SSH Key should be used to authenticate to Linux machine

___userName.description: Name of the account used for connection to VM
